long_description: Loaded with pop and built for precision anywhere on the hill, the K2 Subculture snowboard is an all-mountain charger ready to slay steep faces, big kickers and fresh pow dumps. All-new Lifted Baseline(TM) offers effortless pop and stability; this board is flat between your feet and is lifted at the tip and tail for camberlike performance. Tweekend profile features a rockered tip for a great feel when sliding rails, landing jumps and carving powder. Hyper Progressive sidecut mellows out the transitions, leaving you with a predictable, all-around board; you can make ultrafine adjustments at any speed and in all conditions. Hybritech construction minimizes the overall amount of materials used to unleash lightweight precision, powerful response and buttery-smooth performance. W2 wood core features three types of renewable wood, assembled to optimize strength, reduce weight and enhance damping without adding other materials. Fiberglass laminated in directional layers adds torsional stiffness, improving edge hold and increasing stability during off-axis landings. Carbon webs near binding area maximize ollie pop and control in any situation; sintered base absorbs wax fast and retains it longer. .
short_description: Loaded with pop and built for precision anywhere on the hill, the K2 Subculture snowboard is an all-mountain charger ready to slay steep faces, big kickers and fresh pow dumps.
